items.sentence: Tom wondered how long it would take Mary to realize that John wouldn't be coming back.
Tom was from a humble background, but he became one of the richest men in the country.
I no longer have to interact with people that I have little to nothing in common with.
I'm not yet sure what we'll do. We'll just play it by ear, depending on how things go.
Could you stand behind my car for a minute and tell me if my brake lights are working?
